name: 楊勝明
objective: Brushless dc and permanent-magnet synchronous motor have higher efficiency and energy to mass ratio in comparison to the other motors, they are gradually replacing induction motor and widely used in industry. This course begins with the theory of basic electromagnetic energy conversion, followed by the modeling and vector control theory for permanent-magnet synchronous motor, design and control of brushless dc motors, and the driving circuit design for these motors.
schedule:
1. PM and magnetic circuit
2. PMSM basics
3. complex vector transformation
4. complex vector model
5. vector control
6. maximum torque control
7. current control
8. PWM drive
9. mid-term exam.
10. field weakening
11. initial position sensing
12. sensorless vector control
13. BLDC basics
14. stator and rotor design
15. design variations
16. drive and control
17. drive and control
18. final exam.
materials:
1.Permanent Magnet Synchronous and Brushless DC Motor Drives, by Ramu Krishnan, CRC Press 2010.
2.Brushless Permanent Motor Design, 2nd Edition, by Duane Hanselman
